analysis.description: TPCToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/9/0x4fc2a761099dbfbd53187942f7fe5c94f532cee7.sol#325-332) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0x4fc2a761099dbfbd53187942f7fe5c94f532cee7.sol:
	Contract TPCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0x4fc2a761099dbfbd53187942f7fe5c94f532cee7.sol#169)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TPCToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/9/0x4fc2a761099dbfbd53187942f7fe5c94f532cee7.sol#302-305) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4fc2a761099dbfbd53187942f7fe5c94f532cee7.sol#304)

TPCToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/9/0x4fc2a761099dbfbd53187942f7fe5c94f532cee7.sol#325-332)
	- /unique_chucks/9/0x4fc2a761099dbfbd53187942f7fe5c94f532cee7.sol#330-331
